rooms.description: A welcoming space featuring a foyer with integrated storage and display areas.
An open-plan living area with a modern aesthetic, large windows for natural light, and comfortable seating.
Adjacent to the kitchen, this space facilitates dining and social gatherings.
Spacious bedroom with an attached walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom. Positioned in a favorable direction per Vastu principles.
Three comfortable bedrooms designed for family members; each with ample storage and natural lighting.
Dedicated quiet space for reading and study, incorporating built-in shelves and a cozy seating area.
Modern kitchen design with integrated appliances, ample prep areas, and an island counter to facilitate interaction.
Bathroom for guests and family use, designed for convenience.

openings.description: Large main entry door ensuring ease of access while adhering to security standards.
A series of energy-efficient windows placed strategically for optimum natural light and ventilation.
Access door to the swimming pool area; designed with safety and privacy in mind.
